description:
Ronaldo tells Draluc about his brother, his brother comes to visit, and Ronaldo almost misses a deadline.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aniki Saga: Hikari no Shou / Aniki Saga: Yami no Shou / Oshuraba Koushinkyoku
Big Brother Saga, Light Chapter / Big Brother Saga, Dark Chapter / The Deadline March
La saga du frère (Chapitre de la lumière) / La saga du frère (Chapitre de l`obscurité) / Marche combative
アニキ・サーガ 光の章 / アニキ・サーガ 闇の章 / お修羅場行進曲
